sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.580, 'Quartettino II' (for title, see No. 207)
ms_copies_parts: Paris, Bibl. de l'Opéra, Réserve 507 (2) (for title and comment, see No. 207)
sources.first_edition: 1958, Rome, del Turco, in vol. 1 in the series Classici Italiani della Musica published under the auspices of UNESCO (score; revised by Pina Carmirelli)
later_editions: 1960, Hamburg/London, Simrock (separate parts; revised by W. Höckner and H. Młynarczyk)

entries.notes: Repeat of the Minuetto and Trio 2 mentioned

partial_notes: Entry begins with publication information, likely continuing from previous page. Movement structure shows Minuetto with Trio 1 and Trio 2.
